document_data.name: Claws of Thard Harr
document_data.mainbody: '''''Claws of Thard Harr''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Thard Harr]].
document_data.Effects: When cast on a targeted creature, this spell transformed their hands into sharp talons. The recipient of the spell, who had to be willing, was not able to wield a weapon while the spell was in effect.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as [[material component]]s the [[holy symbol]] of Thard Harr as well as a preserved talon from a wild animal, which was not consumed in the casting.
